## Our Services

Deep Blue Analysis provides statistical consulting, education, training sessions and strategic guidance to corporate, non-profit, and government clients.

## Our Team

Deep Blue is led by D. Alex Hughes.

Alex received his PhD in 2016 from the University of California, San Diego. He is currently a member of the faculty in the School of Information at UC Berkeley where he holds an appointment as an Associate Professor of Practice.
